 1 | # Plan for Task Management Web Application
 2 | 
 3 | ## 1. Technology Stack
 4 | - **Framework**: ReactJS (or NextJS for SSR)
 5 | - **State Management**: Redux
 6 | - **Styling**: styled-components
 7 | - **UI Libraries**: None (we will only use styled-components)
 8 | 
 9 | ---
10 | 
11 | ## 2. Project Structure
12 | - **Frontend**:
13 |   - `/components`: Reusable components (e.g., Table, Drawer, Filters, Graphs)
14 |   - `/pages`: Routes (`/table`, `/dashboard`)
15 |   - `/redux`: Redux store, slices, and actions
16 |   - `/styles`: Global and theme styles
17 |   - `/utils`: Helper functions (e.g., API calls, data processing)
18 |   - `/tests`: Unit and integration tests
19 | 
20 | ---
21 | 
22 | ## 3. Features and Implementation
23 | 
24 | ### A. Table View Page (`/table`)
25 | 1. **Data Fetching**:
26 |    - Use an open-source API or mock server for task data.
27 |    - Handle loading, error, and empty states.
28 | 
29 | 2. **Table Implementation**:
30 |    - Build a custom table component.
31 |    - Display task details (title, status, due date, priority, etc.).
32 | 
33 | 3. **Filtering, Sorting, and Search**:
34 |    - Add filters for status, priority, and assignees.
35 |    - Enable sorting for multiple columns.
36 |    - Implement a search bar for task name and description.
37 | 
38 | 4. **Infinite Loading**:
39 |    - Load additional data as the user scrolls.
40 | 
41 | 5. **Drawer Interaction**:
42 |    - Open a side drawer on row click.
43 |    - Display task details and comments (read-only).
44 | 
45 | 6. **Edit Columns**:
46 |    - Add a modal for showing, hiding, and rearranging columns.
47 |    - Persist column configuration using local storage.
48 | 
49 | 7. **Accessibility**:
50 |    - Ensure keyboard navigation and ARIA roles.
51 | 
52 | ---
53 | 
54 | ### B. Dashboard Page (`/dashboard`)
55 | 1. **Graphs**:
56 |    - **Graph 1**: Line chart for tasks completed per day.
57 |    - **Graph 2**: Line chart for tasks due per day.
58 |    - **Graph 3**: Pie chart for task estimation hours.
59 | 
60 | 2. **Filters**:
61 |    - Reuse the filter component from the table view.
62 | 
63 | 3. **Graph Data**:
64 |    - Process the same dataset or use separate endpoints.
65 | 
66 | 4. **UX/UI**:
67 |    - Ensure responsiveness and interactivity (tooltips, hover states).
68 | 
69 | ---
70 | 
71 | ## 4. Bonus Features
72 | - **Unit & Integration Tests**:
73 |   - Use Jest and React Testing Library.
74 | - **Theming**:
75 |   - Implement a light/dark theme.
76 | - **Performance Optimization**:
77 |   - Use virtualization for large datasets.

</file_content>

import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components';

export const GlobalStyles = createGlobalStyle`
  * {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  html, body {
    height: 100%;
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen,
      Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
    background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.background};
    color: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.primary};
    transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
  }

  #root {
    height: 100%;
  }

  a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: inherit;
  }

  button, input, select, textarea {
    font-family: inherit;
    font-size: inherit;
    color: inherit;
    background: none;
    border: none;
    outline: none;
  }

  button {
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  ul, ol {
    list-style: none;
  }

  /* Scrollbar styles */
  ::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
  }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
    border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.full};
  }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.disabled};
  }

  /* For Firefox */
  * {
    scrollbar-width: thin;
    scrollbar-color: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.border} ${theme.surface}`};
  }
`;

export default GlobalStyles;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';

const LayoutContainer = styled.div`
  height: 100%;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 240px 1fr;
`;

const Sidebar = styled.nav`
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-right: 1px solid ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.md};
`;

const NavLink = styled(Link)`
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.md};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.sm};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.md};
  color: ${({ theme, active }) => active ? theme.primary : theme.text.primary};
  background-color: ${({ theme, active }) => active ? `${theme.primary}10` : 'transparent'};
  
  &:hover {
    background-color: ${({ theme, active }) => active ? `${theme.primary}20` : `${theme.text.primary}10`};
  }
`;

const MainContent = styled.main`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  overflow-y: auto;
`;

const Layout = ({ children }) => {
  const location = useLocation();
  
  return (
    <LayoutContainer>
      <Sidebar>
        <NavLink to="/table" active={location.pathname === '/table' ? 1 : 0}>
          Table View
        </NavLink>
        <NavLink to="/dashboard" active={location.pathname === '/dashboard' ? 1 : 0}>
          Dashboard
        </NavLink>
      </Sidebar>
      <MainContent>
        {children}
      </MainContent>
    </LayoutContainer>
  );
};

export default Layout;
</content>

import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components';
import { ThemeType } from './theme';

export const GlobalStyles = createGlobalStyle<{ theme: ThemeType }>`
  * {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  html, body {
    height: 100%;
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen,
      Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
    background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.background};
    color: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.primary};
    transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
  }

  #root {
    height: 100%;
  }

  a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: inherit;
  }

  button, input, select, textarea {
    font-family: inherit;
    font-size: inherit;
    color: inherit;
    background: none;
    border: none;
    outline: none;
  }

  button {
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  ul, ol {
    list-style: none;
  }

  /* Scrollbar styles */
  ::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
  }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
    border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.full};
  }

  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.disabled};
  }

  /* For Firefox */
  * {
    scrollbar-width: thin;
    scrollbar-color: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.border} ${theme.surface}`};
  }
`;

export default GlobalStyles;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { ReactNode } from 'react';

interface LayoutProps {
  children: ReactNode;
}

interface StyledNavLinkProps {
  active: number;
}

const LayoutContainer = styled.div`
  height: 100%;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 240px 1fr;
`;

const Sidebar = styled.nav`
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-right: 1px solid ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.md};
`;

const NavLink = styled(Link)<StyledNavLinkProps>`
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.md};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.sm};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.md};
  color: ${({ theme, active }) => active ? theme.primary : theme.text.primary};
  background-color: ${({ theme, active }) => active ? `${theme.primary}10` : 'transparent'};
  
  &:hover {
    background-color: ${({ theme, active }) => active ? `${theme.primary}20` : `${theme.text.primary}10`};
  }
`;

const MainContent = styled.main`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  overflow-y: auto;
`;

const Layout: React.FC<LayoutProps> = ({ children }) => {
  const location = useLocation();
  
  return (
    <LayoutContainer>
      <Sidebar>
        <NavLink to="/table" active={location.pathname === '/table' ? 1 : 0}>
          Table View
        </NavLink>
        <NavLink to="/dashboard" active={location.pathname === '/dashboard' ? 1 : 0}>
          Dashboard
        </NavLink>
      </Sidebar>
      <MainContent>
        {children}
      </MainContent>
    </LayoutContainer>
  );
};

export default Layout;
</content>

<content>
import { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
import { lightTheme, darkTheme } from './styles/theme';
import GlobalStyles from './styles/globalStyles';
import Layout from './components/Layout';
import TableView from './pages/TableView';
import DashboardView from './pages/DashboardView';

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(false);

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    setIsDarkMode(!isDarkMode);
  };

  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={isDarkMode ? darkTheme : lightTheme}>
      <GlobalStyles />
      <Router>
        <Layout>
          <Routes>
            <Route path="/table" element={<TableView />} />
            <Route path="/dashboard" element={<DashboardView />} />
            <Route path="/" element={<Navigate to="/table" replace />} />
          </Routes>
        </Layout>
      </Router>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
};

export default App;
</content>

import React from 'react';
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client';
import { Provider } from 'react-redux';
import { store } from './app/store';
import App from './App';
import './index.css';

const root = createRoot(container);

root.render(
  <React.StrictMode>
    <Provider store={store}>
      <App />
    </Provider>
  </React.StrictMode>
);

  BrowserRouter: ({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) => <>{children}</>,
  Routes: ({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) => <>{children}</>,
  Route: ({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) => <>{children}</>,
  Navigate: () => <div>Navigate</div>
}));

    render(
      <Provider store={store}>
        <ThemeProvider theme={lightTheme}>
          <App />
        </ThemeProvider>
      </Provider>
    );
    expect(screen.getByText(/Task Management/i)).toBeInTheDocument();
  });
});

export type TaskStatus = 'todo' | 'inProgress' | 'completed';
export type TaskPriority = 'high' | 'medium' | 'low';

export interface Task {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  description: string;
  status: TaskStatus;
  priority: TaskPriority;
  dueDate: string;
  estimatedHours: number;
  assignee: string;
  createdAt: string;
  updatedAt: string;
}

export interface TaskState {
  tasks: Task[];
  loading: boolean;
  error: string | null;
  selectedTask: Task | null;
  filters: {
    status: TaskStatus[];
    priority: TaskPriority[];
    searchQuery: string;
  };
  sort: {
    field: keyof Task;
    direction: 'asc' | 'desc';
  };
}

import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit';
import { Task, TaskState, TaskStatus, TaskPriority } from '../../types/task';

const initialState: TaskState = {
  tasks: [],
  loading: false,
  error: null,
  selectedTask: null,
  filters: {
    status: [],
    priority: [],
    searchQuery: ''
  },
  sort: {
    field: 'createdAt',
    direction: 'desc'
  }
};

export const taskSlice = createSlice({
  name: 'tasks',
  initialState,
  reducers: {
    setLoading: (state, action: PayloadAction<boolean>) => {
      state.loading = action.payload;
    },
    setError: (state, action: PayloadAction<string | null>) => {
      state.error = action.payload;
    },
    setTasks: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task[]>) => {
      state.tasks = action.payload;
    },
    addTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task>) => {
      state.tasks.push(action.payload);
    },
    updateTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task>) => {
      const index = state.tasks.findIndex(task => task.id === action.payload.id);
      if (index !== -1) {
        state.tasks[index] = action.payload;
      }
    },
    deleteTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => {
      state.tasks = state.tasks.filter(task => task.id !== action.payload);
    },
    setSelectedTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task | null>) => {
      state.selectedTask = action.payload;
    },
    setStatusFilter: (state, action: PayloadAction<TaskStatus[]>) => {
      state.filters.status = action.payload;
    },
    setPriorityFilter: (state, action: PayloadAction<TaskPriority[]>) => {
      state.filters.priority = action.payload;
    },
    setSearchQuery: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => {
      state.filters.searchQuery = action.payload;
    },
    setSortConfig: (state, action: PayloadAction<{ field: keyof Task; direction: 'asc' | 'desc' }>) => {
      state.sort = action.payload;
    }
  }
});

export const {
  setLoading,
  setError,
  setTasks,
  addTask,
  updateTask,
  deleteTask,
  setSelectedTask,
  setStatusFilter,
  setPriorityFilter,
  setSearchQuery,
  setSortConfig
} = taskSlice.actions;

export default taskSlice.reducer;
</content>

import { Task, TaskStatus, TaskPriority } from '../types/task';

export const filterTasks = (
  tasks: Task[],
  statusFilter: TaskStatus[],
  priorityFilter: TaskPriority[],
  searchQuery: string
): Task[] => {
  return tasks.filter((task) => {
    const matchesStatus = statusFilter.length === 0 || statusFilter.includes(task.status);
    const matchesPriority = priorityFilter.length === 0 || priorityFilter.includes(task.priority);
    const matchesSearch = searchQuery === '' || 
      task.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
      task.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
      task.assignee.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase());

    return matchesStatus && matchesPriority && matchesSearch;
  });
};

export const sortTasks = (
  tasks: Task[],
  field: keyof Task,
  direction: 'asc' | 'desc'
): Task[] => {
  return [...tasks].sort((a, b) => {
    let comparison = 0;
    
    if (typeof a[field] === 'string' && typeof b[field] === 'string') {
      comparison = (a[field] as string).localeCompare(b[field] as string);
    } else if (typeof a[field] === 'number' && typeof b[field] === 'number') {
      comparison = (a[field] as number) - (b[field] as number);
    } else {
      // Handle date fields
      const dateFields = ['dueDate', 'createdAt', 'updatedAt'];
      if (dateFields.includes(field)) {
        comparison = new Date(a[field] as string).getTime() - new Date(b[field] as string).getTime();
      }
    }

    return direction === 'asc' ? comparison : -comparison;
  });
};

export const getStatusColor = (status: TaskStatus): string => {
  const colors = {
    todo: '#FF9500',
    inProgress: '#5856D6',
    completed: '#34C759'
  };
  return colors[status];
};

export const getPriorityColor = (priority: TaskPriority): string => {
  const colors = {
    high: '#FF3B30',
    medium: '#FF9500',
    low: '#34C759'
  };
  return colors[priority];
};

export const formatDate = (dateString: string): string => {
  return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
    year: 'numeric',
    month: 'short',
    day: 'numeric'
  });
};
</content>

  text-align: left;
  font-weight: ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.body.fontWeight};
  color: ${({ theme, isActive }) => isActive ? theme.primary : theme.text.secondary};
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  white-space: nowrap;
  
  &:hover {
    color: ${({ theme }) => theme.primary};
  }
`;

  margin-left: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xs};
  display: inline-block;
  transform: ${({ direction }) => direction === 'asc' ? 'rotate(180deg)' : 'none'};
  
  &::after {
    content: '↓';
  }
`;

const TableHeader: React.FC<TableHeaderProps> = ({
  field,
  label,
  sortField,
  sortDirection,
  onSort
}) => {
  const isActive = sortField === field;

  return (
    <HeaderCell
      isActive={isActive}
      onClick={() => onSort(field)}
    >
      {label}
      {isActive && <SortIcon direction={sortDirection} />}
    </HeaderCell>
  );
};

export default TableHeader;

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { Task } from '../../types/task';
import TableHeader from './TableHeader';
import TableRow from './TableRow';

interface TableProps {
  tasks: Task[];
  sortField: keyof Task;
  sortDirection: 'asc' | 'desc';
  onSort: (field: keyof Task) => void;
  onTaskSelect: (task: Task) => void;
}

const TableContainer = styled.div`
  width: 100%;
  overflow-x: auto;
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.lg};
  box-shadow: ${({ theme }) => theme.shadows.sm};
`;

const StyledTable = styled.table`
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  min-width: 1000px;
`;

const TableHeaderRow = styled.tr`
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-bottom: 1px solid ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
`;

const columns: { field: keyof Task; label: string }[] = [
  { field: 'title', label: 'Title' },
  { field: 'description', label: 'Description' },
  { field: 'status', label: 'Status' },
  { field: 'priority', label: 'Priority' },
  { field: 'dueDate', label: 'Due Date' },
  { field: 'estimatedHours', label: 'Estimate' },
  { field: 'assignee', label: 'Assignee' },
  { field: 'createdAt', label: 'Created' },
];

const Table: React.FC<TableProps> = ({
  tasks,
  sortField,
  sortDirection,
  onSort,
  onTaskSelect,
}) => {
  return (
    <TableContainer>
      <StyledTable>
        <thead>
          <TableHeaderRow>
            {columns.map(({ field, label }) => (
              <TableHeader
                key={field}
                field={field}
                label={label}
                sortField={sortField}
                sortDirection={sortDirection}
                onSort={onSort}
              />
            ))}
          </TableHeaderRow>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
          {tasks.map((task) => (
            <TableRow
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              onClick={onTaskSelect}
            />
          ))}
        </tbody>
      </StyledTable>
    </TableContainer>
  );
};

export default Table;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { TaskStatus, TaskPriority } from '../../types/task';
import { getStatusColor, getPriorityColor } from '../../utils/taskUtils';

interface FiltersProps {
  selectedStatus: TaskStatus[];
  selectedPriority: TaskPriority[];
  searchQuery: string;
  onStatusChange: (status: TaskStatus[]) => void;
  onPriorityChange: (priority: TaskPriority[]) => void;
  onSearchChange: (query: string) => void;
}

const FiltersContainer = styled.div`
  display: flex;
  gap: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.lg};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
`;

const FilterGroup = styled.div`
  display: flex;
  gap: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.sm};
`;

const FilterButton = styled.button<{ isSelected: boolean; color: string }>`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.spacing.sm} ${theme.spacing.md}`};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.full};
  background-color: ${({ isSelected, color }) =>
    isSelected ? `${color}15` : 'transparent'};
  color: ${({ isSelected, color, theme }) =>
    isSelected ? color : theme.text.secondary};
  border: 1px solid ${({ isSelected, color, theme }) =>
    isSelected ? color : theme.border};
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;

  &:hover {
    background-color: ${({ color }) => `${color}10`};
    border-color: ${({ color }) => color};
    color: ${({ color }) => color};
  }
`;

const SearchInput = styled.input`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.spacing.sm} ${theme.spacing.md}`};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.md};
  border: 1px solid ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  color: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.primary};
  min-width: 200px;

  &:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.primary};
  }

  &::placeholder {
    color: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.disabled};
  }
`;

const statuses: TaskStatus[] = ['todo', 'inProgress', 'completed'];
const priorities: TaskPriority[] = ['high', 'medium', 'low'];

const Filters: React.FC<FiltersProps> = ({
  selectedStatus,
  selectedPriority,
  searchQuery,
  onStatusChange,
  onPriorityChange,
  onSearchChange,
}) => {
  const toggleStatus = (status: TaskStatus) => {
    if (selectedStatus.includes(status)) {
      onStatusChange(selectedStatus.filter((s) => s !== status));
    } else {
      onStatusChange([...selectedStatus, status]);
    }
  };

  const togglePriority = (priority: TaskPriority) => {
    if (selectedPriority.includes(priority)) {
      onPriorityChange(selectedPriority.filter((p) => p !== priority));
    } else {
      onPriorityChange([...selectedPriority, priority]);
    }
  };

  return (
    <FiltersContainer>
      <FilterGroup>
        {statuses.map((status) => (
          <FilterButton
            key={status}
            isSelected={selectedStatus.includes(status)}
            color={getStatusColor(status)}
            onClick={() => toggleStatus(status)}
          >
            {status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + status.slice(1)}
          </FilterButton>
        ))}
      </FilterGroup>

      <FilterGroup>
        {priorities.map((priority) => (
          <FilterButton
            key={priority}
            isSelected={selectedPriority.includes(priority)}
            color={getPriorityColor(priority)}
            onClick={() => togglePriority(priority)}
          >
            {priority.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + priority.slice(1)}
          </FilterButton>
        ))}
      </FilterGroup>

      <SearchInput
        placeholder="Search tasks..."
        value={searchQuery}
        onChange={(e) => onSearchChange(e.target.value)}
      />
    </FiltersContainer>
  );
};

export default Filters;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { useAppDispatch, useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks';
import { 
  setTasks, 
  setStatusFilter, 
  setPriorityFilter, 
  setSearchQuery, 
  setSortConfig,
  setSelectedTask 
} from '../features/tasks/taskSlice';
import { Task } from '../types/task';
import { filterTasks, sortTasks } from '../utils/taskUtils';
import Table from '../components/Table/Table';
import Filters from '../components/Filters/Filters';
import Drawer from '../components/Drawer/Drawer';
import { mockTasks } from '../features/tasks/mockData';

const Container = styled.div`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

const Title = styled.h1`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h1};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

const TableView: React.FC = () => {
  const dispatch = useAppDispatch();
  const { 
    tasks,
    filters,
    sort,
    selectedTask
  } = useAppSelector(state => state.tasks);

  const [isDrawerOpen, setIsDrawerOpen] = useState(false);

  // Load mock data
  useEffect(() => {
    dispatch(setTasks(mockTasks));
  }, [dispatch]);

  // Apply filters and sorting
  const filteredTasks = filterTasks(
    tasks,
    filters.status,
    filters.priority,
    filters.searchQuery
  );

  const sortedTasks = sortTasks(
    filteredTasks,
    sort.field,
    sort.direction
  );

  // Event handlers
  const handleSort = (field: keyof Task) => {
    dispatch(setSortConfig({
      field,
      direction: sort.field === field && sort.direction === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc'
    }));
  };

  const handleTaskSelect = (task: Task) => {
    dispatch(setSelectedTask(task));
    setIsDrawerOpen(true);
  };

  const handleDrawerClose = () => {
    setIsDrawerOpen(false);
    setTimeout(() => {
      dispatch(setSelectedTask(null));
    }, 300); // Wait for drawer animation to complete
  };

  return (
    <Container>
      <Title>Task Management</Title>
      
      <Filters
        selectedStatus={filters.status}
        selectedPriority={filters.priority}
        searchQuery={filters.searchQuery}
        onStatusChange={(status) => dispatch(setStatusFilter(status))}
        onPriorityChange={(priority) => dispatch(setPriorityFilter(priority))}
        onSearchChange={(query) => dispatch(setSearchQuery(query))}
      />

      <Table
        tasks={sortedTasks}
        sortField={sort.field}
        sortDirection={sort.direction}
        onSort={handleSort}
        onTaskSelect={handleTaskSelect}
      />

      <Drawer
        task={selectedTask}
        isOpen={isDrawerOpen}
        onClose={handleDrawerClose}
      />
    </Container>
  );
};

export default TableView;
</content>

import { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
import { lightTheme, darkTheme } from './styles/theme';
import GlobalStyles from './styles/globalStyles';
import Layout from './components/Layout';
import TableView from './pages/TableView';
import DashboardView from './pages/DashboardView';

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('darkMode');
    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : false;
  });

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    const newMode = !isDarkMode;
    setIsDarkMode(newMode);
    localStorage.setItem('darkMode', JSON.stringify(newMode));
  };

  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={isDarkMode ? darkTheme : lightTheme}>
      <GlobalStyles />
      <Router>
        <Layout onThemeToggle={toggleTheme} isDarkMode={isDarkMode}>
          <Routes>
            <Route path="/table" element={<TableView />} />
            <Route path="/dashboard" element={<DashboardView />} />
            <Route path="/" element={<Navigate to="/table" replace />} />
          </Routes>
        </Layout>
      </Router>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
};

export default App;
</content>

import { render, screen } from '@testing-library/react';
import { Provider } from 'react-redux';
import { store } from './app/store';
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
import { lightTheme } from './styles/theme';
import App from './App';

// Mock components to avoid router issues in tests
jest.mock('react-router-dom', () => ({
  ...jest.requireActual('react-router-dom'),
  BrowserRouter: ({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) => <>{children}</>,
  Routes: ({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) => <>{children}</>,
  Route: ({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) => <>{children}</>,
  Navigate: () => null,
  useLocation: () => ({ pathname: '/table' })
}));

describe('App Component', () => {
  beforeEach(() => {
    // Clear localStorage before each test
    localStorage.clear();
  });

  it('renders table view by default', () => {
    render(
      <Provider store={store}>
        <ThemeProvider theme={lightTheme}>
          <App />
        </ThemeProvider>
      </Provider>
    );

    expect(screen.getByText(/Task Management/i)).toBeInTheDocument();
  });

  it('preserves theme preference', () => {
    localStorage.setItem('darkMode', 'true');

    render(
      <Provider store={store}>
        <ThemeProvider theme={lightTheme}>
          <App />
        </ThemeProvider>
      </Provider>
    );

    const themeToggle = screen.getByText(/Light Mode/i);
    expect(themeToggle).toBeInTheDocument();
  });
});
</content>

<content>
import styled from 'styled-components';
import { useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks';
import { 
  LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, 
  ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell 
} from 'recharts';
import { Task } from '../types/task';
import { formatDate } from '../utils/taskUtils';

const Container = styled.div`
  display: grid;
  gap: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
`;

const Card = styled.div`
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.lg};
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  box-shadow: ${({ theme }) => theme.shadows.sm};

  &.full-width {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
  }
`;

const Title = styled.h1`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h1};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  grid-column: 1 / -1;
`;

const ChartTitle = styled.h2`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h2};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.lg};
`;

const DashboardView: React.FC = () => {
  const tasks = useAppSelector(state => state.tasks.tasks);

  // Prepare data for tasks completed per day
  const tasksCompletedData = tasks
    .filter(task => task.status === 'completed')
    .reduce((acc: { date: string; count: number }[], task) => {
      const date = formatDate(task.updatedAt);
      const existing = acc.find(item => item.date === date);
      if (existing) {
        existing.count += 1;
      } else {
        acc.push({ date, count: 1 });
      }
      return acc;
    }, [])
    .sort((a, b) => new Date(a.date).getTime() - new Date(b.date).getTime());

  // Prepare data for tasks due per day
  const tasksDueData = tasks
    .reduce((acc: { date: string; count: number }[], task) => {
      const date = formatDate(task.dueDate);
      const existing = acc.find(item => item.date === date);
      if (existing) {
        existing.count += 1;
      } else {
        acc.push({ date, count: 1 });
      }
      return acc;
    }, [])
    .sort((a, b) => new Date(a.date).getTime() - new Date(b.date).getTime());

  // Prepare data for task estimation hours
  const taskEstimationData = tasks
    .reduce((acc: { status: string; hours: number }[], task) => {
      const existing = acc.find(item => item.status === task.status);
      if (existing) {
        existing.hours += task.estimatedHours;
      } else {
        acc.push({ status: task.status, hours: task.estimatedHours });
      }
      return acc;
    }, []);

  // Colors for pie chart
  const COLORS = ['#FF9500', '#5856D6', '#34C759'];

  return (
    <Container>
      <Title>Dashboard</Title>
      
      <Card className="full-width">
        <ChartTitle>Tasks Completed per Day</ChartTitle>
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
          <LineChart data={tasksCompletedData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="date" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="count" stroke="#34C759" strokeWidth={2} />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </Card>

      <Card>
        <ChartTitle>Tasks Due per Day</ChartTitle>
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
          <LineChart data={tasksDueData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="date" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="count" stroke="#007AFF" strokeWidth={2} />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </Card>

      <Card>
        <ChartTitle>Task Estimation Hours</ChartTitle>
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
          <PieChart>
            <Pie
              data={taskEstimationData}
              dataKey="hours"
              nameKey="status"
              cx="50%"
              cy="50%"
              outerRadius={100}
              label={(entry) => `${entry.status}: ${entry.hours}h`}
            >
              {taskEstimationData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={entry.status} fill={COLORS[index]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
          </PieChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </Card>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default DashboardView;
</content>

<path>README.md</path>
<content>
# Task Management Application

A modern task management application built with React, TypeScript, and Redux. Features include:

- Task listing with sorting and filtering capabilities
- Dashboard with task analytics
- Light/Dark theme support
- Responsive design

## Technologies Used

- React
- TypeScript
- Redux Toolkit for state management
- Styled Components for styling
- Recharts for data visualization
- React Router for navigation

## Features

### Table View
- Display tasks with sortable columns
- Filter tasks by status and priority
- Search functionality
- Task details drawer
- Responsive table design

### Dashboard View
- Tasks completed per day chart
- Tasks due per day chart
- Task estimation hours distribution
- Interactive charts with tooltips

## Getting Started

1. Clone the repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/task-management-comet.git
cd task-management-comet
```

2. Install dependencies
```bash
npm install
```

3. Start the development server
```bash
npm start
```

The application will be available at [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)

## Available Scripts

- `npm start` - Runs the app in development mode
- `npm test` - Runs the test suite
- `npm run build` - Builds the app for production
- `npm run eject` - Ejects from Create React App

## Project Structure

```
src/
├── app/                    # Redux store setup
├── components/            # Reusable components
│   ├── Table/            # Table-related components
│   ├── Filters/          # Filter components
│   └── Drawer/           # Task details drawer
├── features/             # Redux slices and features
│   └── tasks/            # Task-related state management
├── pages/                # Page components
├── styles/               # Global styles and themes
├── types/                # TypeScript type definitions
└── utils/                # Utility functions
```

## Testing

The project includes unit tests for components and utilities. Run the tests with:

```bash
npm test
```

## Contributing

1. Fork the repository
2. Create your feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/amazing-feature`)
3. Commit your changes (`git commit -m 'Add some amazing feature'`)
4. Push to the branch (`git push origin feature/amazing-feature`)
5. Open a Pull Request

## License

This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details
</content>

import { useState } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
import { lightTheme, darkTheme } from './styles/theme';
import { GlobalStyles } from './styles/globalStyles';
import Layout from './components/Layout';
import TableView from './pages/TableView';
import DashboardView from './pages/DashboardView';

const App: React.FC = () => {
  const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('darkMode');
    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : false;
  });

  const toggleTheme = () => {
    const newMode = !isDarkMode;
    setIsDarkMode(newMode);
    localStorage.setItem('darkMode', JSON.stringify(newMode));
  };

  const theme = isDarkMode ? darkTheme : lightTheme;

  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
      <GlobalStyles theme={theme} />
      <Router>
        <Layout onThemeToggle={toggleTheme} isDarkMode={isDarkMode}>
          <Routes>
            <Route path="/table" element={<TableView />} />
            <Route path="/dashboard" element={<DashboardView />} />
            <Route path="/" element={<Navigate to="/table" replace />} />
          </Routes>
        </Layout>
      </Router>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
};

export default App;
</content>

import { createSlice, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit';
import { Task, TaskState, TaskStatus, TaskPriority } from '../../types/task';
import { mockTasks } from './mockData';

const initialState: TaskState = {
  tasks: mockTasks, // Initialize with mock data
  loading: false,
  error: null,
  selectedTask: null,
  filters: {
    status: [],
    priority: [],
    searchQuery: ''
  },
  sort: {
    field: 'createdAt',
    direction: 'desc'
  }
};

export const taskSlice = createSlice({
  name: 'tasks',
  initialState,
  reducers: {
    setLoading: (state, action: PayloadAction<boolean>) => {
      state.loading = action.payload;
    },
    setError: (state, action: PayloadAction<string | null>) => {
      state.error = action.payload;
    },
    setTasks: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task[]>) => {
      state.tasks = action.payload;
    },
    addTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task>) => {
      state.tasks.push(action.payload);
    },
    updateTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task>) => {
      const index = state.tasks.findIndex(task => task.id === action.payload.id);
      if (index !== -1) {
        state.tasks[index] = action.payload;
      }
    },
    deleteTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => {
      state.tasks = state.tasks.filter(task => task.id !== action.payload);
    },
    setSelectedTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task | null>) => {
      state.selectedTask = action.payload;
    },
    setStatusFilter: (state, action: PayloadAction<TaskStatus[]>) => {
      state.filters.status = action.payload;
    },
    setPriorityFilter: (state, action: PayloadAction<TaskPriority[]>) => {
      state.filters.priority = action.payload;
    },
    setSearchQuery: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => {
      state.filters.searchQuery = action.payload;
    },
    setSortConfig: (state, action: PayloadAction<{ field: keyof Task; direction: 'asc' | 'desc' }>) => {
      state.sort = action.payload;
    }
  }
});

export const {
  setLoading,
  setError,
  setTasks,
  addTask,
  updateTask,
  deleteTask,
  setSelectedTask,
  setStatusFilter,
  setPriorityFilter,
  setSearchQuery,
  setSortConfig
} = taskSlice.actions;

export default taskSlice.reducer;
</content>

      state.filters.searchQuery = action.payload;
    },
    setSortConfig: (state, action: PayloadAction<{ field: keyof Task; direction: 'asc' | 'desc' }>) => {
      state.sort = action.payload;
    }
  }
});

export const {
  setLoading,
  setError,
  setTasks,
  addTask,
  updateTask,
  deleteTask,
  setSelectedTask,
  setStatusFilter,
  setPriorityFilter,
  setSearchQuery,
  setSortConfig
} = taskSlice.actions;

export default taskSlice.reducer;
</content>

<path>server/index.ts</path>
<content>
import express from 'express';
import cors from 'cors';
import { Task } from '../src/types/task';
import { mockTasks } from '../src/features/tasks/mockData';

const app = express();
const port = 3001; // Using 3001 since React will use 3000

// Middleware
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json());

// Routes
app.get('/api/tasks', (req, res) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
});

// CRUD operations
app.post('/api/tasks', (req, res) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body,
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
});

app.put('/api/tasks/:id', (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
});

app.delete('/api/tasks/:id', (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
});

// Start server
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Server is running on http://localhost:${port}`);
});
</content>

import { Task } from '../../types/task';

const API_BASE_URL = 'http://localhost:3001/api';

export const taskAPI = {
  getAllTasks: async (): Promise<Task[]> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks`);
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to fetch tasks');
    }
    return response.json();
  },

  createTask: async (task: Omit<Task, 'id' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt'>): Promise<Task> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks`, {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      },
      body: JSON.stringify(task),
    });
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to create task');
    }
    return response.json();
  },

  updateTask: async (task: Task): Promise<Task> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks/${task.id}`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      },
      body: JSON.stringify(task),
    });
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to update task');
    }
    return response.json();
  },

  deleteTask: async (taskId: string): Promise<void> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks/${taskId}`, {
      method: 'DELETE',
    });
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to delete task');
    }
  },
};
</content>

import * as express from 'express';
import * as cors from 'cors';
import { Request, Response } from 'express';
import { Task } from '../src/types/task';
import { mockTasks } from '../src/features/tasks/mockData';

const app = express();
const port = 3001; // Using 3001 since React will use 3000

// Middleware
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json());

// Routes
app.get('/api/tasks', (_req: Request, res: Response) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
});

// CRUD operations
app.post('/api/tasks', (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body,
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
});

app.put('/api/tasks/:id', (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
});

app.delete('/api/tasks/:id', (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
});

// Start server
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Server is running on http://localhost:${port}`);
});

});

  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {

  };

});

interface TypedRequestBody<T> extends Request {
  body: T
}

interface TypedRequestParams<T> extends Request {
  params: T
}

const app = express();
const port = 3001;

// Enable CORS for all routes
app.use(cors());

// Parse JSON bodies
app.use(express.json());

// Get all tasks
app.get('/api/tasks', (_req: Request, res: Response) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
});

app.post('/api/tasks', (req: TypedRequestBody<Omit<Task, 'id' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt'>>, res: Response) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body,
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
});

// Update task
app.put('/api/tasks/:id', (req: TypedRequestParams<{ id: string }> & TypedRequestBody<Partial<Task>>, res: Response) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);

    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
});

// Delete task
app.delete('/api/tasks/:id', (req: TypedRequestParams<{ id: string }>, res: Response) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
});

import express from 'express';
import cors from 'cors';
import { Task } from './types/task';
import { mockTasks } from './data/mockTasks';

const app = express();
const port = 3001;

// Enable CORS for all routes
app.use(cors());

// Parse JSON bodies
app.use(express.json());

// Get all tasks
app.get('/api/tasks', (req, res) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
});

// Create new task
app.post('/api/tasks', (req, res) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body,
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
});

// Update task
app.put('/api/tasks/:id', (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
});

// Delete task
app.delete('/api/tasks/:id', (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
});

// Health check endpoint
app.get('/health', (req, res) => {
  res.json({ status: 'ok' });
});

// Error handling middleware
app.use((err: Error, req: express.Request, res: express.Response, next: express.NextFunction) => {
  console.error(err.stack);
  res.status(500).json({ message: 'Something went wrong!' });
});

// Start server
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Server is running on http://localhost:${port}`);
  console.log(`Health check: http://localhost:${port}/health`);
});
</content>

import express, { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';
import cors from 'cors';
import { Task } from './types/task';
import { mockTasks } from './data/mockTasks';

type RequestWithId = Request<{ id: string }>;
type TaskRequest = Request<{}, {}, Partial<Task>>;
type TaskRequestWithId = Request<{ id: string }, {}, Partial<Task>>;

const app = express();
const port = 3001;

// Enable CORS for all routes
app.use(cors());

// Parse JSON bodies
app.use(express.json());

// Get all tasks
app.get('/api/tasks', (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
});

// Create new task
app.post('/api/tasks', (req: TaskRequest, res: Response) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body as Task, // Type assertion since we know the shape matches
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
});

// Update task
app.put('/api/tasks/:id', (req: TaskRequestWithId, res: Response) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
});

// Delete task
app.delete('/api/tasks/:id', (req: RequestWithId, res: Response) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
});

// Health check endpoint
app.get('/health', (req: Request, res: Response) => {
  res.json({ status: 'ok' });
});

// Error handling middleware
app.use((err: Error, req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) => {
  console.error(err.stack);
  res.status(500).json({ message: 'Something went wrong!' });
});

// Start server
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Server is running on http://localhost:${port}`);
  console.log(`Health check: http://localhost:${port}/health`);
});

import express from 'express';
import cors from 'cors';
import { Task } from './types/task';
import { mockTasks } from './data/mockTasks';

const app = express();
const router = express.Router();
const port = 3001;

// Enable CORS for all routes
app.use(cors());

// Parse JSON bodies
app.use(express.json());

// GET all tasks
router.get('/tasks', (_, res) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
});

// POST new task
router.post('/tasks', (req, res) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body as Task,
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
});

// PUT update task
router.put('/tasks/:id', (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
});

// DELETE task
router.delete('/tasks/:id', (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
});

// Health check endpoint
router.get('/health', (_, res) => {
  res.json({ status: 'ok' });
});

// Mount the router with /api prefix
app.use('/api', router);

// Error handling middleware
app.use((err: Error, req: express.Request, res: express.Response, next: express.NextFunction) => {
  console.error(err.stack);
  res.status(500).json({ message: 'Something went wrong!' });
});

// Start server
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Server is running on http://localhost:${port}`);
  console.log(`Health check: http://localhost:${port}/api/health`);
});
</content>

import { Router, Request, Response } from 'express';
import { Task } from '../types/task';

const router = Router();

type RequestWithId = Request<{ id: string }>;
type TaskResponse = Response<Task | Task[] | { message: string }>;

// GET all tasks
router.get('/', (_req: Request, res: TaskResponse) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
});

router.post('/', (req: Request, res: TaskResponse) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body,
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
});

// PUT update task
router.put('/:id', (req: RequestWithId, res: TaskResponse) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
});

// DELETE task
router.delete('/:id', (req: RequestWithId, res: Response) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    return res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
});

export default router;

import { Router, RequestHandler } from 'express';
import { Task } from '../types/task';
import { mockTasks } from '../data/mockTasks';

const router = Router();

interface ParamsWithId {
  id: string;
}

// GET all tasks
const getAllTasks: RequestHandler = (_req, res) => {
  res.json(mockTasks);
  return;
};

// POST new task
const createTask: RequestHandler = (req, res) => {
  const newTask: Task = {
    ...req.body,
    id: Date.now().toString(),
    createdAt: new Date().toISOString(),
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  mockTasks.push(newTask);
  res.status(201).json(newTask);
  return;
};

// PUT update task
const updateTask: RequestHandler<ParamsWithId> = (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
    return;
  }
  
  mockTasks[taskIndex] = {
    ...mockTasks[taskIndex],
    ...req.body,
    updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
  };
  
  res.json(mockTasks[taskIndex]);
  return;
};

// DELETE task
const deleteTask: RequestHandler<ParamsWithId> = (req, res) => {
  const taskIndex = mockTasks.findIndex(task => task.id === req.params.id);
  if (taskIndex === -1) {
    res.status(404).json({ message: 'Task not found' });
    return;
  }
  
  mockTasks.splice(taskIndex, 1);
  res.status(204).send();
  return;
};

// Mount route handlers
router.get('/', getAllTasks);
router.post('/', createTask);
router.put('/:id', updateTask);
router.delete('/:id', deleteTask);

export default router;

import express from 'express';
import cors from 'cors';
import taskRoutes from './routes/tasks';

const app = express();
const port = 3001;

// Middleware
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json());

// Health check endpoint
app.get('/health', (_req, res) => {
  res.json({ status: 'ok' });
  return;
});

// Mount task routes
app.use('/api/tasks', taskRoutes);

// Error handling middleware
app.use((err: Error, req: express.Request, res: express.Response, next: express.NextFunction) => {
  console.error(err.stack);
  res.status(500).json({ message: 'Something went wrong!' });
  return;
});

// Handle 404
app.use((_req: express.Request, res: express.Response) => {
  res.status(404).json({ message: 'Not Found' });
  return;
});

// Start server
app.listen(port, () => {
  console.log(`Server is running on http://localhost:${port}`);
  console.log(`API endpoint: http://localhost:${port}/api/tasks`);
  console.log(`Health check: http://localhost:${port}/health`);
});

export default app;
</content>

import { Task } from '../types/task';

const API_BASE_URL = 'http://localhost:3001/api';

export const TaskService = {
  getAllTasks: async (): Promise<Task[]> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks`);
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to fetch tasks');
    }
    return response.json();
  },

  createTask: async (task: Omit<Task, 'id' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt'>): Promise<Task> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks`, {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      },
      body: JSON.stringify(task),
    });
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to create task');
    }
    return response.json();
  },

  updateTask: async (task: Task): Promise<Task> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks/${task.id}`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      },
      body: JSON.stringify(task),
    });
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to update task');
    }
    return response.json();
  },

  deleteTask: async (taskId: string): Promise<void> => {
    const response = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/tasks/${taskId}`, {
      method: 'DELETE',
    });
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('Failed to delete task');
    }
  }
};

import { createSlice, createAsyncThunk, PayloadAction } from '@reduxjs/toolkit';
import { Task, TaskState, TaskStatus, TaskPriority } from '../../types/task';
import { TaskService } from '../../services/api';

const initialState: TaskState = {
  tasks: [],
  loading: false,
  error: null,
  selectedTask: null,
  filters: {
    status: [],
    priority: [],
    searchQuery: ''
  },
  sort: {
    field: 'createdAt',
    direction: 'desc'
  }
};

// Async thunks
export const fetchTasks = createAsyncThunk(
  'tasks/fetchTasks',
  async () => {
    return await TaskService.getAllTasks();
  }
);

export const createTask = createAsyncThunk(
  'tasks/createTask',
  async (task: Omit<Task, 'id' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt'>) => {
    return await TaskService.createTask(task);
  }
);

export const updateTask = createAsyncThunk(
  'tasks/updateTask',
  async (task: Task) => {
    return await TaskService.updateTask(task);
  }
);

export const deleteTask = createAsyncThunk(
  'tasks/deleteTask',
  async (taskId: string) => {
    await TaskService.deleteTask(taskId);
    return taskId;
  }
);

export const taskSlice = createSlice({
  name: 'tasks',
  initialState,
  reducers: {
    setSelectedTask: (state, action: PayloadAction<Task | null>) => {
      state.selectedTask = action.payload;
    },
    setStatusFilter: (state, action: PayloadAction<TaskStatus[]>) => {
      state.filters.status = action.payload;
    },
    setPriorityFilter: (state, action: PayloadAction<TaskPriority[]>) => {
      state.filters.priority = action.payload;
    },
    setSearchQuery: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => {
      state.filters.searchQuery = action.payload;
    },
    setSortConfig: (state, action: PayloadAction<{ field: keyof Task; direction: 'asc' | 'desc' }>) => {
      state.sort = action.payload;
    }
  },
  extraReducers: (builder) => {
    builder
      // Fetch tasks
      .addCase(fetchTasks.pending, (state) => {
        state.loading = true;
        state.error = null;
      })
      .addCase(fetchTasks.fulfilled, (state, action) => {
        state.loading = false;
        state.tasks = action.payload;
      })
      .addCase(fetchTasks.rejected, (state, action) => {
        state.loading = false;
        state.error = action.error.message || 'Failed to fetch tasks';
      })
      // Create task
      .addCase(createTask.fulfilled, (state, action) => {
        state.tasks.push(action.payload);
      })
      // Update task
      .addCase(updateTask.fulfilled, (state, action) => {
        const index = state.tasks.findIndex(task => task.id === action.payload.id);
        if (index !== -1) {
          state.tasks[index] = action.payload;
        }
      })
      // Delete task
      .addCase(deleteTask.fulfilled, (state, action) => {
        state.tasks = state.tasks.filter(task => task.id !== action.payload);
      });
  }
});

export const {
  setSelectedTask,
  setStatusFilter,
  setPriorityFilter,
  setSearchQuery,
  setSortConfig
} = taskSlice.actions;

export default taskSlice.reducer;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { useAppDispatch, useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks';
import { 
  setStatusFilter, 
  setPriorityFilter, 
  setSearchQuery, 
  setSortConfig,
  setSelectedTask,
  fetchTasks,
  createTask,
  updateTask,
  deleteTask
} from '../features/tasks/taskSlice';
import { Task } from '../types/task';
import { filterTasks, sortTasks } from '../utils/taskUtils';
import Table from '../components/Table/Table';
import Filters from '../components/Filters/Filters';
import Drawer from '../components/Drawer/Drawer';

const Container = styled.div`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

const Title = styled.h1`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h1};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

const TableView: React.FC = () => {
  const dispatch = useAppDispatch();
  const { 
    tasks,
    loading,
    error,
    filters,
    sort,
    selectedTask
  } = useAppSelector(state => state.tasks);

  const [isDrawerOpen, setIsDrawerOpen] = useState(false);

  // Load tasks on mount
  useEffect(() => {
    dispatch(fetchTasks());
  }, [dispatch]);

  // Apply filters and sorting
  const filteredTasks = filterTasks(
    tasks,
    filters.status,
    filters.priority,
    filters.searchQuery
  );

  const sortedTasks = sortTasks(
    filteredTasks,
    sort.field,
    sort.direction
  );

  // Event handlers
  const handleSort = (field: keyof Task) => {
    dispatch(setSortConfig({
      field,
      direction: sort.field === field && sort.direction === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc'
    }));
  };

  const handleTaskSelect = (task: Task) => {
    dispatch(setSelectedTask(task));
    setIsDrawerOpen(true);
  };

  const handleDrawerClose = () => {
    setIsDrawerOpen(false);
    setTimeout(() => {
      dispatch(setSelectedTask(null));
    }, 300); // Wait for drawer animation to complete
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <div>Loading...</div>;
  }

  if (error) {
    return <div>Error: {error}</div>;
  }

  return (
    <Container>
      <Title>Task Management</Title>
      
      <Filters
        selectedStatus={filters.status}
        selectedPriority={filters.priority}
        searchQuery={filters.searchQuery}
        onStatusChange={(status) => dispatch(setStatusFilter(status))}
        onPriorityChange={(priority) => dispatch(setPriorityFilter(priority))}
        onSearchChange={(query) => dispatch(setSearchQuery(query))}
      />

      <Table
        tasks={sortedTasks}
        sortField={sort.field}
        sortDirection={sort.direction}
        onSort={handleSort}
        onTaskSelect={handleTaskSelect}
      />

      <Drawer
        task={selectedTask}
        isOpen={isDrawerOpen}
        onClose={handleDrawerClose}
      />
    </Container>
  );
};

export default TableView;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { useAppDispatch } from '../../app/hooks';
import { createTask, updateTask, deleteTask } from '../../features/tasks/taskSlice';
import { Task } from '../../types/task';

const ActionsContainer = styled.div`
  display: flex;
  gap: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.md};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.lg};
`;

const Button = styled.button`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.spacing.sm} ${theme.spacing.md}`};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.md};
  border: none;
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.primary};
  color: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  
  &:hover {
    opacity: 0.9;
  }

  &.delete {
    background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.error};
  }
`;

interface TaskActionsProps {
  selectedTask: Task | null;
}

const defaultNewTask: Omit<Task, 'id' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt'> = {
  title: 'New Task',
  description: 'Add description here',
  status: 'todo',
  priority: 'medium',
  dueDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
  estimatedHours: 1,
  assignee: 'Unassigned'
};

const TaskActions: React.FC<TaskActionsProps> = ({ selectedTask }) => {
  const dispatch = useAppDispatch();

  const handleCreateTask = () => {
    dispatch(createTask(defaultNewTask));
  };

  const handleUpdateTask = () => {
    if (selectedTask) {
      dispatch(updateTask({
        ...selectedTask,
        status: selectedTask.status === 'completed' ? 'inProgress' : 'completed'
      }));
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteTask = () => {
    if (selectedTask) {
      if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this task?')) {
        dispatch(deleteTask(selectedTask.id));
      }
    }
  };

  return (
    <ActionsContainer>
      <Button onClick={handleCreateTask}>
        Create Task
      </Button>
      {selectedTask && (
        <>
          <Button onClick={handleUpdateTask}>
            Toggle Status
          </Button>
          <Button className="delete" onClick={handleDeleteTask}>
            Delete Task
          </Button>
        </>
      )}
    </ActionsContainer>
  );
};

export default TaskActions;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { useAppDispatch, useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks';
import { 
  setStatusFilter, 
  setPriorityFilter, 
  setSearchQuery, 
  setSortConfig,
  setSelectedTask,
  fetchTasks
} from '../features/tasks/taskSlice';
import { Task } from '../types/task';
import { filterTasks, sortTasks } from '../utils/taskUtils';
import Table from '../components/Table/Table';
import Filters from '../components/Filters/Filters';
import Drawer from '../components/Drawer/Drawer';
import TaskActions from '../components/TaskActions/TaskActions';

const Container = styled.div`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

const Title = styled.h1`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h1};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

export const TableView: React.FC = () => {
  const dispatch = useAppDispatch();
  const { 
    tasks,
    loading,
    error,
    filters,
    sort,
    selectedTask
  } = useAppSelector(state => state.tasks);

  const [isDrawerOpen, setIsDrawerOpen] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    dispatch(fetchTasks());
  }, [dispatch]);

  const filteredTasks = filterTasks(
    tasks,
    filters.status,
    filters.priority,
    filters.searchQuery
  );

  const sortedTasks = sortTasks(
    filteredTasks,
    sort.field,
    sort.direction
  );

  const handleSort = (field: keyof Task) => {
    dispatch(setSortConfig({
      field,
      direction: sort.field === field && sort.direction === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc'
    }));
  };

  const handleTaskSelect = (task: Task) => {
    dispatch(setSelectedTask(task));
    setIsDrawerOpen(true);
  };

  const handleDrawerClose = () => {
    setIsDrawerOpen(false);
    setTimeout(() => {
      dispatch(setSelectedTask(null));
    }, 300);
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <div>Loading...</div>;
  }

  if (error) {
    return <div>Error: {error}</div>;
  }

  return (
    <Container>
      <Title>Task Management</Title>
      
      <Filters
        selectedStatus={filters.status}
        selectedPriority={filters.priority}
        searchQuery={filters.searchQuery}
        onStatusChange={(status) => dispatch(setStatusFilter(status))}
        onPriorityChange={(priority) => dispatch(setPriorityFilter(priority))}
        onSearchChange={(query) => dispatch(setSearchQuery(query))}
      />

      <TaskActions selectedTask={selectedTask} />

      <Table
        tasks={sortedTasks}
        sortField={sort.field}
        sortDirection={sort.direction}
        onSort={handleSort}
        onTaskSelect={handleTaskSelect}
      />

      <Drawer
        task={selectedTask}
        isOpen={isDrawerOpen}
        onClose={handleDrawerClose}
      />
    </Container>
  );
};

export default TableView;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useAppDispatch, useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks';
import { fetchTasks } from '../features/tasks/taskSlice';
import { 
  LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, 
  ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell 
} from 'recharts';
import { formatDate } from '../utils/taskUtils';

const Container = styled.div`
  display: grid;
  gap: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
`;

const Card = styled.div`
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.lg};
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  box-shadow: ${({ theme }) => theme.shadows.sm};

  &.full-width {
    grid-column: 1 / -1;
  }
`;

const Title = styled.h1`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h1};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
  grid-column: 1 / -1;
`;

const ChartTitle = styled.h2`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h2};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.lg};
`;

export const DashboardView: React.FC = () => {
  const dispatch = useAppDispatch();
  const { tasks, loading, error } = useAppSelector(state => state.tasks);

  useEffect(() => {
    dispatch(fetchTasks());
  }, [dispatch]);

  const tasksCompletedData = tasks
    .filter(task => task.status === 'completed')
    .reduce((acc: { date: string; count: number }[], task) => {
      const date = formatDate(task.updatedAt);
      const existing = acc.find(item => item.date === date);
      if (existing) {
        existing.count += 1;
      } else {
        acc.push({ date, count: 1 });
      }
      return acc;
    }, [])
    .sort((a, b) => new Date(a.date).getTime() - new Date(b.date).getTime());

  const tasksDueData = tasks
    .reduce((acc: { date: string; count: number }[], task) => {
      const date = formatDate(task.dueDate);
      const existing = acc.find(item => item.date === date);
      if (existing) {
        existing.count += 1;
      } else {
        acc.push({ date, count: 1 });
      }
      return acc;
    }, [])
    .sort((a, b) => new Date(a.date).getTime() - new Date(b.date).getTime());

  const taskEstimationData = tasks
    .reduce((acc: { status: string; hours: number }[], task) => {
      const existing = acc.find(item => item.status === task.status);
      if (existing) {
        existing.hours += task.estimatedHours;
      } else {
        acc.push({ status: task.status, hours: task.estimatedHours });
      }
      return acc;
    }, []);

  const COLORS = ['#FF9500', '#5856D6', '#34C759'];

  if (loading) {
    return <div>Loading...</div>;
  }

  if (error) {
    return <div>Error: {error}</div>;
  }

  return (
    <Container>
      <Title>Dashboard</Title>
      
      <Card className="full-width">
        <ChartTitle>Tasks Completed per Day</ChartTitle>
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
          <LineChart data={tasksCompletedData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="date" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="count" stroke="#34C759" strokeWidth={2} />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </Card>

      <Card>
        <ChartTitle>Tasks Due per Day</ChartTitle>
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
          <LineChart data={tasksDueData}>
            <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
            <XAxis dataKey="date" />
            <YAxis />
            <Tooltip />
            <Line type="monotone" dataKey="count" stroke="#007AFF" strokeWidth={2} />
          </LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </Card>

      <Card>
        <ChartTitle>Task Estimation Hours</ChartTitle>
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
          <PieChart>
            <Pie
              data={taskEstimationData}
              dataKey="hours"
              nameKey="status"
              cx="50%"
              cy="50%"
              outerRadius={100}
              label={(entry) => `${entry.status}: ${entry.hours}h`}
            >
              {taskEstimationData.map((entry, index) => (
                <Cell key={entry.status} fill={COLORS[index]} />
              ))}
            </Pie>
            <Tooltip />
          </PieChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </Card>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default DashboardView;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { Task } from '../../types/task';
import { getStatusColor, getPriorityColor, formatDate } from '../../utils/taskUtils';
import { useAppDispatch } from '../../app/hooks';
import { updateTask, deleteTask } from '../../features/tasks/taskSlice';

const Row = styled.tr`
  &:hover {
    background-color: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.text.primary}05`};
  }
`;

const Cell = styled.td`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.md};
  border-bottom: 1px solid ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  max-width: 200px;
`;

const Description = styled(Cell)`
  color: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.secondary};
  font-size: ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.small.fontSize};
`;

const Badge = styled.span<{ color: string }>`
  background-color: ${({ color }) => `${color}15`};
  color: ${({ color }) => color};
  padding: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.spacing.xs} ${theme.spacing.sm}`};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.full};
  font-size: ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.small.fontSize};
  font-weight: 500;
`;

const ActionButton = styled.button`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.spacing.xs} ${theme.spacing.sm}`};
  margin: 0 ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xs};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.sm};
  border: none;
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  color: ${({ theme }) => theme.text.primary};
  cursor: pointer;
  
  &:hover {
    background-color: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.text.primary}10`};
  }

  &.delete {
    color: ${({ theme }) => theme.error};
    &:hover {
      background-color: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.error}10`};
    }
  }

  &.view {
    color: ${({ theme }) => theme.primary};
    &:hover {
      background-color: ${({ theme }) => `${theme.primary}10`};
    }
  }
`;

interface TableRowProps {
  task: Task;
  onViewDetails: (task: Task) => void;
}

const TableRow: React.FC<TableRowProps> = ({ task, onViewDetails }) => {
  const dispatch = useAppDispatch();

  const handleToggleStatus = (e: React.MouseEvent) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    dispatch(updateTask({
      ...task,
      status: task.status === 'completed' ? 'inProgress' : 'completed'
    }));
  };

  const handleDelete = (e: React.MouseEvent) => {
    e.stopPropagation();
    if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this task?')) {
      dispatch(deleteTask(task.id));
    }
  };

  return (
    <Row>
      <Cell>{task.title}</Cell>
      <Description>{task.description}</Description>
      <Cell>
        <Badge color={getStatusColor(task.status)}>
          {task.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + task.status.slice(1)}
        </Badge>
      </Cell>
      <Cell>
        <Badge color={getPriorityColor(task.priority)}>
          {task.priority.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + task.priority.slice(1)}
        </Badge>
      </Cell>
      <Cell>{formatDate(task.dueDate)}</Cell>
      <Cell>{task.estimatedHours}h</Cell>
      <Cell>{task.assignee}</Cell>
      <Cell>
        <ActionButton onClick={handleToggleStatus}>
          {task.status === 'completed' ? '↺ Reopen' : '✓ Complete'}
        </ActionButton>
        <ActionButton className="view" onClick={() => onViewDetails(task)}>
          👁 View
        </ActionButton>
        <ActionButton className="delete" onClick={handleDelete}>
          🗑 Delete
        </ActionButton>
      </Cell>
    </Row>
  );
};

export default TableRow;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { Task } from '../../types/task';
import TableHeader from './TableHeader';
import TableRow from './TableRow';

interface TableProps {
  tasks: Task[];
  sortField: keyof Task;
  sortDirection: 'asc' | 'desc';
  onSort: (field: keyof Task) => void;
  onTaskSelect: (task: Task) => void;
}

const TableContainer = styled.div`
  width: 100%;
  overflow-x: auto;
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-radius: ${({ theme }) => theme.borderRadius.lg};
  box-shadow: ${({ theme }) => theme.shadows.sm};
`;

const StyledTable = styled.table`
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  min-width: 1000px;
`;

const TableHeaderRow = styled.tr`
  background-color: ${({ theme }) => theme.surface};
  border-bottom: 1px solid ${({ theme }) => theme.border};
`;

const columns: { field: keyof Task; label: string }[] = [
  { field: 'title', label: 'Title' },
  { field: 'description', label: 'Description' },
  { field: 'status', label: 'Status' },
  { field: 'priority', label: 'Priority' },
  { field: 'dueDate', label: 'Due Date' },
  { field: 'estimatedHours', label: 'Estimate' },
  { field: 'assignee', label: 'Assignee' },
  { field: 'actions', label: 'Actions' }
];

const Table: React.FC<TableProps> = ({
  tasks,
  sortField,
  sortDirection,
  onSort,
  onTaskSelect
}) => {
  return (
    <TableContainer>
      <StyledTable>
        <thead>
          <TableHeaderRow>
            {columns.map(({ field, label }) => (
              <TableHeader
                key={field}
                field={field}
                label={label}
                sortField={sortField}
                sortDirection={sortDirection}
                onSort={onSort}
              />
            ))}
          </TableHeaderRow>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
          {tasks.map((task) => (
            <TableRow
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              onViewDetails={onTaskSelect}
            />
          ))}
        </tbody>
      </StyledTable>
    </TableContainer>
  );
};

export default Table;
</content>

import styled from 'styled-components';
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { useAppDispatch, useAppSelector } from '../app/hooks';
import { 
  setStatusFilter, 
  setPriorityFilter, 
  setSearchQuery, 
  setSortConfig,
  setSelectedTask,
  fetchTasks
} from '../features/tasks/taskSlice';
import { Task } from '../types/task';
import { filterTasks, sortTasks } from '../utils/taskUtils';
import Table from '../components/Table/Table';
import Filters from '../components/Filters/Filters';
import Drawer from '../components/Drawer/Drawer';
import TaskActions from '../components/TaskActions/TaskActions';

const Container = styled.div`
  padding: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

const Title = styled.h1`
  ${({ theme }) => theme.typography.h1};
  margin-bottom: ${({ theme }) => theme.spacing.xl};
`;

export const TableView: React.FC = () => {
  const dispatch = useAppDispatch();
  const { 
    tasks,
    loading,
    error,
    filters,
    sort,
    selectedTask
  } = useAppSelector(state => state.tasks);

  const [isDrawerOpen, setIsDrawerOpen] = useState(false);

  useEffect(() => {
    dispatch(fetchTasks());
  }, [dispatch]);

  const filteredTasks = filterTasks(
    tasks,
    filters.status,
    filters.priority,
    filters.searchQuery
  );

  const sortedTasks = sortTasks(
    filteredTasks,
    sort.field,
    sort.direction
  );

  const handleSort = (field: keyof Task) => {
    dispatch(setSortConfig({
      field,
      direction: sort.field === field && sort.direction === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc'
    }));
  };

  const handleTaskSelect = (task: Task) => {
    dispatch(setSelectedTask(task));
    setIsDrawerOpen(true);
  };

  const handleDrawerClose = () => {
    setIsDrawerOpen(false);
    setTimeout(() => {
      dispatch(setSelectedTask(null));
    }, 300);
  };

  if (loading) {
    return <div>Loading...</div>;
  }

  if (error) {
    return <div>Error: {error}</div>;
  }

  return (
    <Container>
      <Title>Task Management</Title>
      
      <Filters
        selectedStatus={filters.status}
        selectedPriority={filters.priority}
        searchQuery={filters.searchQuery}
        onStatusChange={(status) => dispatch(setStatusFilter(status))}
        onPriorityChange={(priority) => dispatch(setPriorityFilter(priority))}
        onSearchChange={(query) => dispatch(setSearchQuery(query))}
      />

      <TaskActions />

      <Table
        tasks={sortedTasks}
        sortField={sort.field}
        sortDirection={sort.direction}
        onSort={handleSort}
        onTaskSelect={handleTaskSelect}
      />

      <Drawer
        task={selectedTask}
        isOpen={isDrawerOpen}
        onClose={handleDrawerClose}
      />
    </Container>
  );
};

export default TableView;
</content>
